post_title: FS - SGC Graded and HOF's [NO LONGER FOR SALE]
post_content:
Available for sale are the following T-206:

Lee Quillen (Old Mill) - SGC Graded 4 
Chief Bender No Trees (Polar Bear) 
Fred Clarke Batting (SC 350/25)
Jimmy Collins (Polar Bear) - SOLD

[SHIPPING - I will send the cards USPS Insured.  Please add $5 for every $100 increment you purchase.]

If you want to purchase either of these cards:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" for a specific card will get the card.  This post will secure that card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
Paid for Collins pursuant to email conversation.
